## Database.MusicDbConfig.create() method

Constructs a new [music DB configuration](./ts-music-metadata.database.musicdbconfig.md) from a supplied [public configuration](./ts-music-metadata.database.imusicdbpublicconfig.md) and optional [secrets](./ts-music-metadata.database.imusicdbsecretsconfig.md)<!-- -->. Secrets will be read from the environment if not supplied.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static create(config: string | IMusicDbPublicConfig, connection?: string | IMusicDbSecretsConfig): Result<MusicDbConfig>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  config | string \| [IMusicDbPublicConfig](./ts-music-metadata.database.imusicdbpublicconfig.md) | path to a configuration file or a [MusicDbPublicConfig](./ts-music-metadata.database.musicdbpublicconfig.md) with configuration for the database. |
|  connection | string \| [IMusicDbSecretsConfig](./ts-music-metadata.database.imusicdbsecretsconfig.md) | _(Optional)_ optional path to a configuration file or [IDbConnectionConfig](./ts-music-metadata.database.imusicdbsecretsconfig.md)<!-- -->. Uses environment if not supplied. |

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[MusicDbConfig](./ts-music-metadata.database.musicdbconfig.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the corresponding config on success, or `Failure` with an error message if a problem occurs.
